thread.title: U.S., South Korea to discuss North Korea threat in Seoul talks: Mattis | Reuters
thread.title_full: U.S., South Korea to discuss North Korea threat in Seoul talks: Mattis | Reuters

title: U.S., South Korea to discuss North Korea threat in Seoul talks: Mattis | Reuters
text:
World News | Wed Feb 1, 2017 | 10:58pm EST U.S., South Korea to discuss North Korea threat in Seoul talks: Mattis New U.S. Defense Secretary James Mattis (R) is greeted by Marine General Joseph Dunford, chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, as he arrives for his first day of work at the Pentagon outside Washington, U.S., January 21, 2017. REUTERS/Phil Stewart 
SEOUL U.S. Defense Secretary Jim Mattis said he would sound out ally South Korea on efforts to grapple with North Korea's nuclear and missile programs as he arrived in Seoul on Thursday, including plans to deploy a U.S. missile defense system there. 
"I will talk to them about THAAD absolutely," Mattis told reporters shortly before landing in Seoul, referring to the plans to deploy a Terminal High Altitude Area Defense (THAAD) system in South Korea. 
China has objected to THAAD, saying it will destabilize the regional security balance, leading to calls from some South Korean opposition leaders to delay or cancel it. 
(Reporting by Phil Stewart: Editing by Nick Macfie) Next In World News
